item.title: INTERVIEW WITH PURPLE CROWN (FORMER GROUP MEMBER OF THE BOYS) - SUNDAY 11TH JULY 2010
item.description: Check out this interview with Purple Crown who is a great artist in his own right and a former member of a sensational R&B group of the early 90s called The Boys. Rhodium has an in-depth conversation with Purple Crown about his current solo projects and the heights of being in a very successful boy group. Purple Crown - How Far Will U Go; The Boys - Crazy; Purple Crown - Love Is Alive; Purple Crown - Walking On Water; Purple Crown - The System
